column5: Anyone stop at the bait shop in Dryden? I talking about the one that is connected to the laundromat located across the road from the tracks, down the street from the Beer Store. What's the going rate for a pound of leeches?
Holy Crapola! I paid only $45cad in Sioux Lookout for a pound.
Although I had to order ahead from my fly in outfitter. This time of year they are having a hard time getting leeches from their trapper they say. I'm happy they pulled through for me.
Price is probably going up as they get later in the season too. It's been pretty hard to find leeches the past few weeks in our area.
You're talking about Queen Street Laundromat. Give them a call or email them. They are good people to deal with. You can pre-order too. http://www.qsltackle.ca/
The Great Bear Store outside of Fort Frances.1/2 lb. leeches was $32.76 CDN on June 22nd.
